message: well for iphones the great thing about there UI is that apple creates it so you can use there prepacked things and just extend them to fit your needs and they all look good, for web apps you need a lot more skill and time in photoshop/ css/ javascript animation to get it just correct
thanks italiano40...seems like maybe the best thing is to learn it on my own and forgo formal education to aquire these skills

Formal education is too slow and can't keep up. Any formal education would not be useful. You need to get a book, look at tuts, find a mentor, and just get in it. The best way to learn will be to build an app.
@tyrale been reading Ruby on Rails Tutorial: Learn Rails by Example by Michael Hartl ... just need to find a mentor ... Thank you for your advice!
